metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3291 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in OpenConnect 3.18 allows remote servers to cause a denial of service via a crafted greeting banner.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3291` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenconnect2 - 3.20-2
openconnect - 3.20-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openconnect package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20-2').
